Disable/enable the WWAH bad parent recovery. And set the bad parent check and rejoin period (min), if enabled.

arg.name: enabled
arg.description: Disable ==0, enable == 1, the WWAH bad parent recovery

arg.name: badParentRejoinPeriod
arg.description: the Period of time after which, we check if a parent is bad and try rejoin if so. 0 means use the default value of 24 * 60 mins.
